lexUnit.name: rant.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: speak or shout at length in a wild, impassioned way.

sentence.text: ` Are you two going to spend this evening ranting again ? " interrupted Zach .
` He does n't deserve to , " Clift ranted .
Yer 'll find out when yer older , " she ranted .
` He 's a spy , " he ranted .
` You expect me to believe that drivel ? " ranted the professor .
` But such is the new-found and disturbing power of punk that nothing can stop the disc 's runaway success , " ranted the Sunday Mirror .
` I do n't like computers , " ranted the Doctor .
Micky kept ranting that they were five years out of date .
Rather than locking himself in his bedroom staring mournfully out of the window , Lemn reaches out to his audience , grabs them by the lapels , rapping and ranting his bitter sweet rhyming couplets .
One group was quoted as ranting at a young police woman : ` We 're going to cut your belly open .
I lay in bed and ranted at Richard ; explaining , arguing , weeping with frustration .
When Buck and Ratso go to another greasy spoon , a crazy is ranting in the background .
Commercial breaks were replaced with old clips of Aoun ranting from a balcony to adoring crowds , just like a Nuremberg rally .
She was ranting like a maniac .
Eleanor 's waspish voice ranted on and on .
I sat with Andy while he ranted on .
Mum and Dad ranted on and on .
` It 's no good , Mavis , " Henry told her at dinner time , when she was still ranting on about the unfairness of it all .
It did n't take him long , and all she wanted were her books and all the time the mother was crying and rocking backwards and forwards and the old father was ranting on in Yiddish .
Five minutes ago you were ranting about how you hate your work and yet , when I offer you a perfectly equitable way out of your situation , you hesitate . "
He was ranting now , venting his frustration .
She phoned him at all hours of the day and night , ranting sometimes , crying others .
He ranted and raved because he found out years afterwards what it was the other swine had taken .
` What the hell are you doing here , Brannigan ? " he ranted as he turned the corner of the stairs .
John is still ranting .
` He was ranting and raving at me , " the ward sister said , ` in German "
